text: Hello all, I’m looking for someone (much cleverer than me!) to help with some programmable automation to fulfil a clients requirements regarding feeding data into their Netsuite portal. Can anyone recommend anyone on here that can help with the code / recipe?
<@U01QVR44MEY> if you can’t handle it, let me know and I’ll jump in to help.

I have very good experience with HubSpot CMS and automation. Please check DM.
<https://www.oappsit.com/>
